# hasSupplementaryInterface(at:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final func hasSupplementaryInterface(at point: CGPoint) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **point**: A point in the image, in view coordinates.

## Return Value

`true` if supplementary interface objects exist at `point`; otherwise, `false`.

## Discussion

Supplementary interface objects include the Live Text button and Quick Actions, depending on the item type.

## Querying the interface state

- **liveTextButtonVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Live Text button appears.
- **isSupplementaryInterfaceHidden**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the view hides supplementary interface objects.
- **hasInteractiveItem(at:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether active text, data detectors, or supplementary interface objects exist at the specified point.
- **selectableItemsHighlighted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the interaction highlights actionable text or data the analyzer detects in text.
